rows.label: tlk0001023_msg0002
rows.name:
I'm called Rex, actually.
Pleasure to be working with you.

rows.label: tlk0001023_msg0003
rows.name:
So...I'm guessing you're not going to
fill me in on what exactly it is we're
looking for out here?

rows.label: tlk0001023_msg0006
rows.name:
Well, sure I am.
But I'll do the work I'm paid for
whether you tell me or not.

rows.label: tlk0001023_msg0007
rows.name:
That's what I like to hear, kid.
I just hope your skills are more
advanced than your age.
